content: We have created a page on the FHIR Space in Confluence to capture our review and recommendations for pages in the FHIR Space and also on the Wiki. Marc has reviewed the Wiki space and compared to what is on the FHIR Space to confirm if there is content that wasn't brought over. We will continue to update this page going forward as we complete our review and will be bringing this forward each FMG meeting to determine next steps and who on FMG will help with the content review and updates. https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/FHIR+Space+Review
If you have a chance to do any review in advance, feel free to add your comments in the "Review Notes" column.
@Anne Wizauer can you make sure this is on the agenda for Wednesday?
Sure thing! I created a new standing items section and slotted it there.
